name: Methocarbamol

ingredients.name: SODIUM STARCH GLYCOLATE TYPE A POTATO

indications.text: methocarbamol tablets , usp indicated adjunct rest , physical therapy , measures relief discomfort associated acute , painful musculoskeletal conditions . mode action methocarbamol clearly identified , may related sedative properties . methocarbamol directly relax tense skeletal muscles man .

contraindications.text: methocarbamol tablets , usp , 500 mg – adults : initial : 3 tablets q.i.d . maintenance : 2 tablets q.i.d . methocarbamol tablets , usp : 750 mg – adults : initial : 2 tablets q.i.d . maintenance : 1 tablet q.4h . 2 tablets t.i.d . six grams day recommended first 48 72 hours treatment . ( severe conditions 8 grams day may administered ) . thereafter , usually reduced approximately 4 grams day .

warningsAndPrecautions: methocarbamol tablets , usp 500 mg tablets round standard convex , scored , white off-white tablet , debossed 225 one side plain reverse side . supplied follows : overbagged 10 tablets per bag , ndc 55154-2334-0 methocarbamol tablets , usp750 mg tablets modified capsule shape , white off-white tablet , debossed 226 one side plain reverse side . supplied follows : overbagged 10 tablets per bag , ndc 55154-2335-0
adverseReactions: methocarbamol tablets , usp contraindicated patients hypersensitive methocarbamol tablet components .
indications_original: Methocarbamol tablets, USP are indicated as an adjunct to rest, physical therapy, and other measures for the relief of discomfort associated with acute, painful musculoskeletal conditions. The mode of action of methocarbamol has not been clearly identified, but may be related to its sedative properties. Methocarbamol does not directly relax tense skeletal muscles in man.
contraindications_original:
Methocarbamol tablets, USP, 500 mg – Adults:
                  Initial dosage: 3 tablets q.i.d.
                  Maintenance dosage: 2 tablets q.i.d.
                  
                  Methocarbamol tablets, USP: 750 mg – Adults:
                  Initial dosage: 2 tablets q.i.d.
                  Maintenance dosage: 1 tablet q.4h. or 2 tablets t.i.d.
                  
                     Six grams a day are recommended for the first 48 to 72 hours of treatment. (For severe conditions 8 grams a day may be administered). Thereafter, the dosage can usually be reduced to approximately 4 grams a day.
warningsAndPrecautions_original:
Methocarbamol tablets, USP
                  500 mg tablets are round standard convex, scored, white to off-white tablet, debossed S 225 on one side and plain on the reverse side.
                  They are supplied as follows:
                  Overbagged with 10 tablets per bag, NDC 55154-2334-0
                  
                     Methocarbamol tablets, USP750 mg tablets are modified capsule shape, white to off-white tablet, debossed S 226 on one side and plain on the reverse side.
                  They are supplied as follows:
                  Overbagged with 10 tablets per bag, NDC 55154-2335-0
adverseReactions_original: Methocarbamol tablets, USP are contraindicated in patients hypersensitive to methocarbamol or to any of the tablet components.
